thread.title: Norway Wins Court Case Against Allianz, CPPIB and Other Investors in Gassled Pipeline Dispute
thread.title_full: Norway Wins Court Case Against Allianz, CPPIB and Other Investors in Gassled Pipeline Dispute - WSJ

author: Georgi Kantchev
title: Norway Wins Court Case Against Allianz, CPPIB and Other Investors in Gassled Pipeline Dispute
text:
An Oslo court ruled on Friday against a group of some of the world’s largest investors who had sued Norway for slashing tariffs on a gas pipeline network these funds owned, in a landmark case that could add uncertainty to infrastructure investments in countries long deemed as being investor friendly.
The court upheld the Norwegian government’s 2013 decision to slash tariffs by as much as 90% for transporting natural gas on the Gassled network that hooks North Sea oil and gas fields up to terminals around Europe. A group of...
